titles.title: To direct the President to terminate the designation of Brazil as a beneficiary developing country for purposes of title V of the Trade Act of 1974.
To direct the President to terminate the designation of Brazil as a beneficiary developing country for purposes of title V of the Trade Act of 1974.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Directs the President to terminate Brazil's designation as a beneficiary developing country for purposes of title V of the Trade Act of 1974 (relating to generalized system of preferences).
